column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Deal With a Breakdown
#Text=Do you ever feel like the ground below you is quaking in its tyranny , that the sky is weighing down upon your shoulders and you can barely hold up a pencil with your trembling hands ?
#Text=Ever get sick of the constant sobbing and the way your soul may feel like a tiny wisp of paper inhabiting an empty shell ?
#Text=Constant stress and/or grief can cause this feeling , a feeling of sheer hopelessness and anxiety .
#Text=It is in this state that many make the rash decision to end their lives , since so many are reaching out for a release .
#Text=Read along and you may find a coping skill that may stick , that may free you so you can finally ... breathe .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Get this bottled up energy out .
#Text=Rip up paper , scream into a pillow , yank grass out of its roots , throw around a stuffed animal , etc.
#Text=Do it all in order if you have too , it gets that itch from crawling under your skin like an insipid snake .
#Text=Distract your body .
#Text=Get a cup and fill it up with ice cubes , then , one by one , grip each cube in your hands until you feel you`ve had enough .
#Text=While doing this , think of the longest words in your head and add up their syllables .
#Text=After about five minutes , you should feel slightly better .
#Text=Lay Down .
#Text=It is better if you do this on the floor .
#Text=Put on some music , and place your hands on your stomach .
#Text=Let your stomach rise and fall gently along with your breathing .
#Text=Sing if you feel the urge .
#Text=Wiggle your toes and fingers , and be aware of them moving to your every command , remind yourself that you 're in control .
#Text=If you can , jot down what you feel , even if it is just a few words .
#Text=Refresh yourself .
#Text=Take a shower , scrub off all of the pain and stress , or drink a large glass of cold water .
#Text=Water has healing powers , use it to your best advantage .
#Text=Feel muggy and ill ?
#Text=Mix salt and water together and wait 30 seconds .
#Text=Get a rag and soak it in for a minute , then rub the rag on your skin and the walls of your house .
#Text=Within seconds you should feel the difference .
#Text=Indulge in what you enjoy doing .
#Text=Play the piano , sketch a bit , write a poem , whatever you like .
#Text=Watch a cartoon and smile at the innocence of it .
#Text=Call a friend or look up some jokes on the Internet .
#Text=Distract yourself .
#Text=Talk about it .
#Text=Grab your Teddy Bear and pour out your emotions .
#Text=Cry to your goldfish .
#Text=Try speaking with a friend or a member of your family .
#Text=Communicating is key .
#Text=Even though at first it may not sound right to say it out loud , it helps .
#Text=Do n't ask for advice , just say everything that is troubling you .
#Text=No need to be ashamed even if it might sound ridiculous .
#Text=If you ca n't find someone to say all of this to , write it down .
#Text=Video
#Text=Warnings
#Text=When you hold the ice cubes , don`t hold them for TOO long .
